title: How do I switch to a Sony platform?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• How do I switch to a PS4/ PSVita or other Sony platform?
  • I want to deploy to a Playstation platform, how can I do this?

sections.title: Cause
content: If you attempt to build to a Sony platform, you will be faced with the following (or a similar) message if you are not using a Playstation license:
“Your license does not cover PS4 publishing"

sections.title: Resolution
content: To start working on PS4 or other Sony platform, you will need to be a registered Sony developer in order to use the Playstation license. To acquire the license you should contact your representative at Sony. They will be able to provide you with a license for you to use and work on your project/game for your choice of Sony hardware.
To register as a Sony Developer, please go to the following link.

sections.title: More Information
content: For information on how to access the Playstation forums, please see this page.
